original_title: New NATO commander, military chiefs reaffirm Ukraine support in virtual meeting | Fox News
article_summary: NATO military leaders reaffirm support for Ukraine's security during a virtual meeting, discussing potential peace guarantees amidst President Trump's efforts to facilitate a Putin-Zelenskyy summit. The meeting emphasized the alliance's focus on a "just, credible and durable peace" and praised the "relentless courage" of Ukrainian forces.</s>
